cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Amortization term can only be equal to zero on Non-Amortizing instruments

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Current Par Balance = Original Par Balance
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Instrument has originated in past but Current Par Balance and Original Par Balance are equal

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Deferred Current Balance = Deferred Original Balance
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Instrument has originated in past but Deferred Current Balance and Deferred Original Balance are equal
Accrual basis code must be between 1 and 7 inclusively
Amortization type must be a valid OFSAA code
Amortization type is Payment Pattern but Payment Pattern Code is invalid
Amortization type is Payment Pattern but Payment Pattern definition does not exist
Amortization type is Behaviour Pattern but Behaviour Pattern Code is invalid
Amortization type is Behaviour Pattern but Behaviour Pattern definition does not exist
Cannot find record with matching ID Number, Identity Code and Instrument Type Code in Payment Schedule table
Origination Date is greater than highest date in Payment Schedule
Amortization term multiplier must be D, M, or Y

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Invalid Negative Amortization Equalization Frequency Multiplier
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Negative Amortization Equalization Frequency multiplier must be D, M, or Y
Negative Amortization limit value does not fall in a valid range (0 to 200), Applicable to Negative amortization instruments only
Original term multiplier must be D, M, or Y

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Invalid Negative Amortization Payment Change Frequency
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Payment Change Frequency cannot be negative, Applicable to Negative amortization instruments only

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Invalid Negative Amortization Payment Change Frequency Multiplier
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Negative Amortization Payment Change Frequency Multiplier must be D, M, or Y
Interest Payment frequency multiplier must be D, M, or Y
Principal Payment frequency multiplier must be D, M, or Y
Rate change round code must be between 0 and 4
Rate Set Lag Multiplier must be D, M, or Y
Repricing Frequency Multiplier must be D, M, or Y
Rate change round factor must be between 0 and 1

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Maturity Date < Next Interest Payment Date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Maturity date cannot be before the next interest payment date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.assignment: (CASE INT_PMT_FREQ_MULT WHEN 'Y' THEN ADD_MONTHS(NEXT_INT_PAYMENT_DATE, ((REMAIN_NO_PMTS -1)* INT_PMT_FREQ * 12)) WHEN 'M' THEN ADD_MONTHS(NEXT_INT_PAYMENT_DATE,  ((REMAIN_NO_PMTS -1)* INT_PMT_FREQ)) ELSE NEXT_INT_PAYMENT_DATE + ((REMAIN_NO_PMTS -1)* INT_PMT_FREQ) END)

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Maturity Date < Next Principal Payment Date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Maturity date cannot be before the next principal payment date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.assignment: (CASE PRIN_PMT_FREQ_MULT WHEN 'Y' THEN ADD_MONTHS(NEXT_PRIN_PAYMENT_DATE, ((REMAIN_NO_PMTS -1)* PRIN_PMT_FREQ * 12)) WHEN 'M' THEN ADD_MONTHS(NEXT_PRIN_PAYMENT_DATE, ((REMAIN_NO_PMTS -1)* PRIN_PMT_FREQ)) ELSE NEXT_PRIN_PAYMENT_DATE + ((REMAIN_NO_PMTS -1)* PRIN_PMT_FREQ) END)

cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Negative amortization equalization frequency cannot be negative, Applicable to Negative amortization instruments only

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Negative Amortization Equalization Date < Origination Date or As of Date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Negative Amortization equalization date is less than origination date (future origination) or less than the as-of-date (past origination), Applicable to Negative Amortization instruments only

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Negative Amortization Equalization Date > Maturity Date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Negative Amortization equalization date is after Maturity Date, Applicable to Negative Amortization instruments only

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Next Interest Payment Date < As of Date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Next interest payment date is less than as-of-date (past origination case), As of Date can not be greater than the origination date and greater than the next payment date.

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Next Principal Payment Date < As of Date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Next principal payment date is less than as-of-date (past origination case), As of Date can not be greater than the origination date and greater than the next payment date.

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Next Interest Payment Date < Origination Date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Next interest payment date is less than origination date (future origination case)

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Next Principal Payment Date < Origination Date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Next principal payment date is less than origination date (future origination case)

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Next Reprice Date < As of Date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Next repricing date is less than as-of-date (past origination case)
cashFlowEditsRulesList.assignment: (CASE REPRICE_FREQ_MULT WHEN 'Y' THEN ADD_MONTHS(AS_OF_DATE, REPRICE_FREQ*12) WHEN 'M' THEN ADD_MONTHS(AS_OF_DATE, REPRICE_FREQ) ELSE AS_OF_DATE + REPRICE_FREQ END)

cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Next repricing date is less than the origination date (future origination case)
cashFlowEditsRulesList.assignment: (CASE REPRICE_FREQ_MULT WHEN 'Y' THEN ADD_MONTHS(ORIGINATION_DATE, REPRICE_FREQ*12) WHEN 'M' THEN ADD_MONTHS(ORIGINATION_DATE, REPRICE_FREQ) ELSE ORIGINATION_DATE + REPRICE_FREQ END)

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Original Payment Amount = 0 and Negative Amortization Payment Decrease Limit (Life) <> 0
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Payment decrease life is expressed as a percent of a original payment, Applicable to negative amortization instruments only

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Original Payment Amount = 0 and Negative Amortization Payment Increase Limit (Life) <> 0
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Payment increase life is expressed as a percent of a original payment, Applicable to negative amortization instruments only

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Original Term <> Maturity Date - Orgination Date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Original term should equal the time between the origination date and the maturity date
Origination date must be acceptable
Interest Payment frequency cannot be greater than original term
Principal Payment frequency cannot be greater than original term

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Current Payment and Current Par Balance have opposite signs
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Current payment and current par balance can not have opposite signs

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Negative Amortization Payment Adjustment Date < As of Date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Negative Amortization Payment Adjustment Date is less than the as-of-date (past origination), Applicable to negative amortization instruments only

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Negative Amortization Payment Adjustment Date < Origination Date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Negative Amortization Payment adjustment date is less than origination date (future origination), Applicable to negative amortization instruments only
Interest Payment frequency is less than or equal to zero, and both maturity date and origination date are valid dates and can be used to calculate payment frequency.
Principal Payment frequency is less than or equal to zero, and both maturity date and origination date are valid dates and can be used to calculate payment frequency.
Interest payment frequency is less than or equal to zero and maturity date is invalid, but next interest payment date can be used to calculate a valid payment frequency
Principal payment frequency is less than or equal to zero and maturity date is invalid, but next interest payment date can be used to calculate a valid payment frequency
Interest payment frequency is less than or equal to zero and all dates which can be used to calculate payment frequency are in the past
Principal payment frequency is less than or equal to zero and all dates which can be used to calculate payment frequency are in the past
Negative Amortization Payment increase limit (cycle) cannot be less than zero, Applicable to negative amortization instruments only
Minimum rate change can not be negative
Rate decrease limit (cycle) must not be negative
Rate increase limit (cycle) can not be less than 0
There has to be at least 1 payment left
Rate set lag cannot be negative

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Last Reprice Date > Next Reprice Date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Last repricing date is greater than next repricing date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.assignment: (CASE REPRICE_FREQ_MULT WHEN 'Y' THEN ADD_MONTHS(NEXT_REPRICE_DATE, -REPRICE_FREQ*12) WHEN 'M' THEN ADD_MONTHS(NEXT_REPRICE_DATE, -REPRICE_FREQ) ELSE NEXT_REPRICE_DATE - REPRICE_FREQ END)

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Adjustable Rate instrument has invalid Interest Rate Code
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Interest rate code must be valid for adjustable rate instruments

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Invalid Interest Rate Code. Curve Type is not Interest Rate Curve
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Interest rate code of instrument is not an yield curve. Repricing attributes will be ignored and processed as fixed interest rate;
Valid net margin codes are 0 or 1.
Payment Decrease Limit (Cycle) cannot be less than zero. Applicable to negative amortization instruments only
Payment Decrease Limit (Life) cannot be less than zero. Applicable to negative amortization instruments only
Payment Increase Limit (Life) cannot be less than zero. Applicable to negative amortization instruments only
Issue date can not be greater than origination date
Repricing frequency must not be negative

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Amortization type is Rule of 78's but Reprice Frequency is not 0
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Rule of 78's instruments are implicitly fixed rate.
The balance as of the last repricing date cannot be equal to 0

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Amortization type is Rule of 78's but Adjustable Type is not fixed
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Rule of 78's instrument should only have a Fixed adjustable type code.

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Last interest payment date > Next interest payment date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Last interest payment date is greater than next interest payment date and can be calculated using interest payment frequency
cashFlowEditsRulesList.assignment: (CASE INT_PMT_FREQ_MULT WHEN 'Y' THEN ADD_MONTHS(NEXT_INT_PAYMENT_DATE, -INT_PMT_FREQ*12) WHEN 'M' THEN ADD_MONTHS(NEXT_INT_PAYMENT_DATE, -INT_PMT_FREQ) ELSE NEXT_INT_PAYMENT_DATE - INT_PMT_FREQ END)

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Last interest payment date > Next interest payment date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Last interest payment date is greater than next interest payment date, but cannot be calculated using interest payment frequency.

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Last principal payment date > Next principal payment date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Last principal payment date is greater than next principal payment date and can be calculated using principal payment frequency
cashFlowEditsRulesList.assignment: (CASE PRIN_PMT_FREQ_MULT WHEN 'Y' THEN ADD_MONTHS(NEXT_PRIN_PAYMENT_DATE, -PRIN_PMT_FREQ*12) WHEN 'M' THEN  ADD_MONTHS(NEXT_PRIN_PAYMENT_DATE, -PRIN_PMT_FREQ) ELSE NEXT_PRIN_PAYMENT_DATE - PRIN_PMT_FREQ END)

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Last principal payment date > Next principal payment date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Last principal payment date is greater than next principal payment date, but cannot be calculated using principal payment frequency.

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Last Interest Payment Date < Origination Date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Last interest payment date cannot be less than the origination date

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Last Principal Payment Date < Origination Date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Last principal payment date cannot be less than the origination date

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Last interest payment date > As of Date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Last interest payment date cannot be greater than the as-of-date if the instrument originated in the past.

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Last principal payment date > As of Date
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Last principal payment date cannot be greater than the as-of-date if the instrument originated in the past.

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Amortization Type is conventional but interest timing is Advance
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Interest type can only be arrears for conventionally amortizing instruments.
Interest type must be a valid OFSAA code.
Compounding basis code must be a valid OFSAA code
Accrual basis code cannot have a 30 day month assumption on instruments with payment frequency multiplier in days or defined by a payment schedule
Behaviour Type Code is Null, defaulted to 1 (Non-Maturity)
Behaviour Type Code is invalid, defaulted to 1 (Non-Maturity)
Behaviour Sub Type should be 201 or 202 or 203 when Behaviour Type is Non-Performing
Behaviour Sub Type should be 305 or 306 when Behaviour Type is Devolvement and Recovery

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Invalid Residual Amount for Lease instrument
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Residual Amount cannot be less than 0 for Lease instrument

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Invalid Residual Amount for Lease instrument
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Residual Amount cannot be higher than Current Par Balance for Lease instrument

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Invalid Adjustable Type for Annuity with Maturity Amount
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Annuity instrument with maturity amount must have fixed interest rate
Expected balance is greater than 0 but offset percentage is less than 0
Invalid reprice pattern code given for instrument
Invalid reprice pattern code given for instrument
Original payment amount is required for fixed-rate instruments
Percent Sold must be greater than or equal to zero and less than 100
Instruments with Current Par Balance zero are not processed.
Embedded option is supported only for non-amortizing instrument
Current gross rate is negative
Current net rate is negative

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Rate Cap Life < Current Net Interest Rate
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Current net rate is greater than the rate cap

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Rate Floor Life > Currrent Net Interest Rate
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Rate floor life must not be greater than the current net rate

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Orginal Par Balance < Current Par Balance
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Original balance on Rule of 78's instruments should be greater than current balance

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Adjustable Negative Amortization instrument has Reprice Frequency = 0
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Reprice Frequency cannot be zero for Adjustable Negative Amortization instrument

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Current Payment is less than Life Pay Floor
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Current payment is less than the minimum payment amount. Applicable to negative amortization instruments only

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Current Payment is greater than Life Pay Cap
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Current payment is greater than the maximum payment amount. Applicable to negative amortization instruments only

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Original Par Balance is 0 for a fixed rate instrument
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: For transfer pricing of fixed rate instruments, the original balance should be populated.
Transfer pricing will not occur when the last repricing date is less than the issue date and origination date

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Reprice Frequency > 0 for fixed rate instrument
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Repricing frequency and adjustable type code are inconsistent

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Adjustable Type is not fixed but Reprice Frequency is 0
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Repricing frequency and adjustable type code are inconsistent

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Adjustable Type is fixed rate for Negative amortization instrument
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Negative amortization instruments cannot have fixed adjustable type code

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Holiday calendar not given for B/252 accrual basis
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Holiday calendar must be give when using Business/252 accrual basis

cashFlowEditsRulesList.ruleName: Calculated Offset Balance > Current Par Balance
cashFlowEditsRulesList.description: Calculated Offset Balance is higher than Current Par Balance
